details.

3. Provide a Description of the proposed solution and work plan, including timeline and 
deliverables. (Maximum: Five Pages) 
 
4. Demonstrate that the bidder is a “responsible bidder” by attesting that the bidder:

The vendor should develop a service-level agreement (SLA) to establish expectations between the 
vendor and the BPHC describing the products or services to be delivered, the single point for end-
user problems, and the metrics by which the effectiveness of the process is monitored and 
approved. 
 
C. SCHEDULE 
 
This is a fast-tracked project and the selected Proposer(s) should begin work upon execution of 
the contract with the BPHC. The mobile application will be launched on or before May 30, 2023. 
The selected Proposer will be required to provide regular reports and meet with a Steering 
Committee made up of BPHC officials, and the BPHC Executive Office throughout the process. The 
selected Proposer will be expected to meet with the Steering Committee on an agreed-upon 
frequency throughout the project. The Proposer will need to establish a deliverable schedule with

The points for the Bid Form response will be based on the following three areas. 
1. Understanding the Requirements: Are all the requirements understood accurately 
and reflected in the solution? 
2. Completeness and appearance of the Proposal: This focuses on the Scope of Service 
itself. Are all aspects of the project addressed appropriately in the proposal? Does it 
leave questions about the project unanswered? 
3. Deliverables: Has the proposer demonstrated that it understands the deliverables the 
BPHC expects it to provide? 
 
 
 
 
20 
C. Vendor Profile: 
Proposals will be evaluated against the RFP specifications and the questions below: 
1. Background and Experience: Do the Vendor's background and experience indicate 
that they are capable of performing the Scope of Services? 
2. Staff: Does the Vendor’s staff that will be assigned to this project have experience on 
similar projects? 
 
 
 
40 
APPENDIX C

answer: The deliverables include the products or services to be delivered as outlined in the service-level agreement (SLA), which establishes expectations between the vendor and the BPHC. Additionally, the selected Proposer will need to establish a deliverable schedule and provide regular reports throughout the project.
